column1: [{"classname": "Andorra", "def_wiki": "A tiny country in Europe, between Spain and France. Official name: Principality of Andorra", "path_wn": ["Andorra"], "def_wn": "a small republic in the eastern Pyrenees between Spain and France"}, {"classname": "United Arab Emirates", "def_wiki": "A country in Western Asia, in the Middle East.", "path_wn": "", "def_wn": ""}, {"classname": "Afghanistan", "def_wiki": "A landlocked country between Central and South Asia. Official name: Islamic Republic of Afghanistan", "path_wn": ["Afghanistan"], "def_wn": "a mountainous landlocked country in central Asia; bordered by Iran to the west and Russia to the north and Pakistan to the east and south"}, {"classname": "Antigua and Barbuda", "def_wiki": "A country in the Caribbean, consisting of the islands of Antigua and Barbuda.", "path_wn": "", "def_wn": ""}, {"classname": "Anguilla", "def_wiki": "A British overseas territory in the Caribbean.", "path_wn": ["Anguilla"], "def_wn": "a British colony in the West Indies"}, {"classname": "Albania", "def_wiki": "A country in southeastern Europe. Official name: Republic of Albania.", "path_wn": ["Albania"], "def_wn": "a republic in southeastern Europe on the Adriatic coast of the Balkan Peninsula"}, {"classname": "Armenia", "def_wiki": "Ancient kingdom in the Armenian Highland southeast of Black Sea and southwest of Caspian Sea; area now divided between Turkey, Republic of Armenia, Azerbaijan, Georgia and Iran.", "path_wn": ["Armenia"], "def_wn": "a landlocked republic in southwestern Asia; formerly an Asian soviet; modern Armenia is but a fragment of ancient Armenia which was one of the world's oldest civilizations; throughout 2500 years the Armenian people have been invaded and oppressed by their neighbors"}, {"classname": "Angola", "def_wiki": "A country in Southern Africa", "path_wn": ["Angola"], "def_wn": "a republic in southwestern Africa on the Atlantic Ocean; achieved independence from Portugal in 1975 and was the scene of civil war until 1990"}, {"classname": "Antarctica", "def_wiki": "The southernmost continent, south of the Southern Ocean, containing the South Pole.", "path_wn": ["Antarctica"], "def_wn": "an extremely cold continent at the south pole almost entirely below the Antarctic Circle; covered by an ice cap up to 13,000 feet deep"}, {"classname": "Argentina", "def_wiki": "A country in South America. Official name: Argentine Republic.", "path_wn": ["Argentina"], "def_wn": "a republic in southern South America; second largest country in South America"}, {"classname": "Austria", "def_wiki": "A country in Central Europe, a member state of the European Union. Official name: Republic of Austria", "path_wn": ["Austria"], "def_wn": "a mountainous republic in central Europe; under the Habsburgs (1278-1918) Austria maintained control of the Holy Roman Empire and was a leader in European politics until the 19th century"}, {"classname": "Australia", "def_wiki": "A country in Oceania. Official name: Commonwealth of Australia.", "path_wn": ["Australia"], "def_wn": "a nation occupying the whole of the Australian continent; Aboriginal tribes are thought to have migrated from southeastern Asia 20,000 years ago; first Europeans were British convicts sent there as a penal colony"}, {"classname": "Aruba", "def_wiki": "An autonomous territory of the Caribbean, a constituent country of the Kingdom of the Netherlands.", "path_wn": ["Aruba"], "def_wn": "a popular island resort in the Netherlands Antilles"}, {"classname": "Aland Islands", "def_wiki": "A contiguous area of land, smaller than a continent, totally surrounded by water.", "path_wn": "", "def_wn": ""}, {"classname": "Azerbaijan", "def_wiki": "A country in the South Caucasus region of Eurasia; official name: Republic of Azerbaijan", "path_wn": ["Azerbaijan"], "def_wn": "a landlocked republic in southwestern Asia; formerly an Asian soviet"}, {"classname": "Bosnia and Herzegovina", "def_wiki": "A country on the Balkan Peninsula which has the capital Sarajevo and which, until 1992, was part of Yugoslavia.", "path_wn": "", "def_wn": ""}, {"classname": "Barbados", "def_wiki": "An island and country in the Caribbean.", "path_wn": ["Barbados"], "def_wn": "a parliamentary democracy on the island of Barbados; former British colony; a popular resort area"}, {"classname": "Bangladesh", "def_wiki": "A country in South Asia. Official name: People's Republic of Bangladesh.", "path_wn": ["Bangladesh"], "def_wn": "a Muslim republic in southern Asia bordered by India to the north and west and east and the Bay of Bengal to the south; formerly part of India and then part of Pakistan; it achieved independence in 1971"}, {"classname": "Belgium", "def_wiki": "A country in Western Europe that has borders with the Netherlands, Germany, Luxembourg and France.", "path_wn": ["Belgium"], "def_wn": "a monarchy in northwestern Europe; headquarters for the European Union and for the North Atlantic Treaty Organization"}, {"classname": "Burkina Faso", "def_wiki": "A country in West Africa. Official name: Burkina Faso. Formerly Upper Volta.", "path_wn": "", "def_wn": ""}, {"classname": "Bulgaria", "def_wiki": "A country in Southeastern Europe. Official name: Republic of Bulgaria", "path_wn": ["Bulgaria"], "def_wn": "a republic in the eastern part of the Balkan Peninsula in southeastern Europe"}, {"classname": "Bahrain", "def_wiki": "A country in the Middle East. Official name: Kingdom of Bahrain.", "path_wn": ["Bahrain"], "def_wn": "an island in the Persian Gulf"}, {"classname": "Benin", "def_wiki": "A country in West Africa, formerly Dahomey.", "path_wn": ["Benin"], "def_wn": "a country on western coast of Africa; formerly under French control"}, {"classname": "Bermuda", "def_wiki": "An island group in the North Atlantic Ocean, 580 nautical miles (1074 kilometers) east-southeast of Cape Hatteras, North Carolina, held as an Overseas Territory by Britain", "path_wn": ["Bermuda"], "def_wn": "a group of islands in the Atlantic off the Carolina coast; British colony; a popular resort"}, {"classname": "Brunei Darussalam", "def_wiki": "The official name of Brunei.", "path_wn": "", "def_wn": ""}, {"classname": "Bolivia", "def_wiki": "A card game similar to rummy and canasta.", "path_wn": ["Bolivia"], "def_wn": "a landlocked republic in central South America; Simon Bolivar founded Bolivia in 1825 after winning independence from Spain"}, {"classname": "Bonaire, Saint Eustatius and Saba", "def_wiki": "A sweet grape syrup made from grape must", "path_wn": "", "def_wn": ""}, {"classname": "Brazil", "def_wiki": "A red-orange dye obtained from brazil wood.", "path_wn": ["Brazil"], "def_wn": "the largest Latin American country and the largest Portuguese speaking country in the world; located in the central and northeastern part of South America; world's leading coffee exporter"}, {"classname": "Bahamas", "def_wiki": "An archipelago and country in the Caribbean. Official names: The Bahamas and Commonwealth of the Bahamas.", "path_wn": ["Bahamas"], "def_wn": "island country in the Atlantic to the east of Florida and Cuba; a popular winter resort"}, {"classname": "Bhutan", "def_wiki": "A landlocked Himalayan country in South Asia. Official name: Kingdom of Bhutan", "path_wn": ["Bhutan"], "def_wn": "a landlocked principality in the Himalayas to the northeast of India"}, {"classname": "Botswana", "def_wiki": "A country in Southern Africa", "path_wn": ["Botswana"], "def_wn": "a landlocked republic in south-central Africa that became independent from British control in the 1960s"}, {"classname": "Belarus", "def_wiki": "A country in Europe. Official name: Republic of Belarus (Belarusian: \u0420\u044d\u0441\u043f\u0443\u0301\u0431\u043b\u0456\u043a\u0430 \u0411\u0435\u043b\u0430\u0440\u0443\u0301\u0441\u044c (Resp\u00fablika Bjelar\u00fas\u02b9)).", "path_wn": ["Belarus"], "def_wn": "a landlocked republic in eastern Europe; formerly a European soviet"}, {"classname": "Belize", "def_wiki": "An English-speaking country in Central America, formerly called British Honduras.", "path_wn": ["Belize"], "def_wn": "a country on the northeastern coast of Central America on the Caribbean; formerly under British control"}, {"classname": "Canada", "def_wiki": "A former liquid measure of four quartilhos, especially used for wine.", "path_wn": ["Canada"], "def_wn": "a nation in northern North America; the French were the first Europeans to settle in mainland Canada"}, {"classname": "DR Congo", "def_wiki": "Abbreviation of Democratic Republic of the Congo.", "path_wn": "", "def_wn": ""}, {"classname": "Central African Republic", "def_wiki": "A country in Central Africa. Official name: Central African Republic.", "path_wn": "", "def_wn": ""}, {"classname": "Switzerland", "def_wiki": "A sovereign country in south central Europe. Official name: Swiss Confederation", "path_wn": ["Switzerland"], "def_wn": "a landlocked federal republic in central Europe"}, {"classname": "Cote d'Ivoire", "def_wiki": "The Ivory Coast, A country in West Africa.", "path_wn": "", "def_wn": ""}, {"classname": "Cook Islands", "def_wiki": "A self-governing country in Oceania, in free association with New Zealand.", "path_wn": "", "def_wn": ""}, {"classname": "Chile", "def_wiki": "Any fruit of a plant of the botanical genus Capsicum, which has a spicy/burning flavour because it contains capsaicin. (Not all chili peppers are particularly spicy, but all true chili peppers contain some capsaicin, in contrast to e.g. the bell pepper, which is not a true chili pepper and does not.)", "path_wn": ["Chile"], "def_wn": "a republic in southern South America on the western slopes of the Andes on the south Pacific coast"}, {"classname": "Cameroon", "def_wiki": "A country in Central Africa. Official name: Republic of Cameroon. Capital: Yaound\u00e9 and it also claims Ambazonia.", "path_wn": ["Cameroon"], "def_wn": "an inactive volcano in western Cameroon; highest peak on the West African coast"}, {"classname": "China", "def_wiki": "Synonym of porcelain, a hard white translucent ceramic made from kaolin, now (chiefly US) sometimes distinguished in reference to tableware as fine or good china.", "path_wn": ["China"], "def_wn": "a communist nation that covers a vast territory in eastern Asia; the most populous country in the world"}, {"classname": "Colombia", "def_wiki": "A country in South America. Official name: Republic of Colombia.", "path_wn": ["Colombia"], "def_wn": "a republic in northwestern South America with a coastline on the Pacific Ocean and the Caribbean Sea; achieved independence from Spain in 1821 under the leadership of Simon Bolivar; Spanish is the official language"}, {"classname": "Costa Rica", "def_wiki": "A country in Central America. Official name: Republic of Costa Rica.", "path_wn": "", "def_wn": ""}, {"classname": "Cuba", "def_wiki": "A country, and the largest island (based on land area) in the Caribbean. Capital and largest city: Havana.", "path_wn": ["Cuba"], "def_wn": "a communist state in the Caribbean on the island of Cuba"}, {"classname": "Cabo Verde", "def_wiki": "Cape Verde, an archipelago and country in West Africa.", "path_wn": "", "def_wn": ""}, {"classname": "Curacao", "def_wiki": "A liqueur, made from eau-de-vie, sugar and, as flavor, dried peel of sweet and sour oranges.", "path_wn": ["Curacao"], "def_wn": "a popular island resort in the Netherlands Antilles"}, {"classname": "Cyprus", "def_wiki": "An island between Europe and the Middle East, in the Mediterranean Sea", "path_wn": ["Cyprus"], "def_wn": "a country on the island of Cyprus; 80% of the people are of Greek origin and 20% or Turkish origin"}, {"classname": "Czech Republic", "def_wiki": "A country in Central Europe.", "path_wn": "", "def_wn": ""}, {"classname": "Germany", "def_wiki": "The Central European state formed by West Germany's 1990 absorption of East Germany, with its capital in Berlin.", "path_wn": ["Germany"], "def_wn": "a republic in central Europe; split into East Germany and West Germany after World War II and reunited in 1990"}, {"classname": "Denmark", "def_wiki": "A country in Northern Europe consisting mainly of most of the Jutland peninsula and a number of islands off its coast (including Zealand and Funen).",
